text: "Little Wing" is a 1967 psychedelic rock song by the English band The Jimi Hendrix Experience and was featured on their album Axis: Bold as Love. The song was written by lead vocalist and guitarist Jimi Hendrix. The song was ranked #357 on Rolling Stone magazine's list of "the 500 Greatest Songs of All Time". The song has been covered by many other musical artists. title: Little Wing
